title: Pixelfonts?
content:
Hi people,   
   
Can somebody recommend a good pixelfont? What is the name of the most common font used?   
   
Thanks,   
/Henriko
author: superfetz

comments.content: Arguably, one of most widely used pixel fonts is Jason Kottke's [Silkscreen](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013030950/http:/web.kottke.org/plus/type/silkscreen/). Whether or not it

Hi Grant,   
Silkscreen is quite OK, but it's a bit too small for the purpose - for instance a menu (only 8 pt)   
Look at this attached JPEG.   
Can you tell what's been used here?   
   
/Henriko   
   
 ![Pixelmenu](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013030950im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/4100/20418.jpg)

Couldn't say. It's not Underware's [Unibody 8 Smallcaps](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013030950/http:/www.underware.nl/site2/index.php3?id1=unibody&id2=family), but that would be nice!   
   
Randy

Looks like Mini7 [http://www.wpdfd.com/pixelfonts.htm](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013030950/http:/www.wpdfd.com/pixelfonts.htm)   
Similar is Sevenet [http://www.fountain.nu/catalogue/sevenet.asp](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013030950/http:/www.fountain.nu/catalogue/sevenet.asp)
I like Matthew Bardram's [Remote](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013030950/http:/www.atomicmedia.net/font.php?font_name=Remote) if you're looking to save a bit of horizontal screen space.
Martin Fredrikson's [OH LA LA](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013030950/http:/www.core.nu/pixelfonts.html) can be helpful too

Hey guys,   
Some damn good suggestions there, thanks!   
Sevenet is definately my favorite and it's perfect for my purpose ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013030950im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif)   
   
Cheers,   
/Henriko

-Fundamental, a very stylish font for text:   
   
 [http://www.atomicmedia.net/font.php?font\_name=Fundamental](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013030950/http:/www.atomicmedia.net/font.php?font_name=Fundamental)   
   
-Quadratis, a Trajan column inspired pixel font for titling, menus and folders.   
   
 [http://www.atomicmedia.net/font.php?font\_name=Quadratis](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013030950/http:/www.atomicmedia.net/font.php?font_name=Quadratis)   
   
mh

Wow! Fundamental and Quadratis are really nice!   
   
Also check out my [bitmap font](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013030950/http:/www.manic.com.sg/blog/archives/000012.php) link collection.
